text: hrux phwk cea khid wa phwk cea ca di khea swrrkh doy yeiyngxyang khxng phu lwnglab pi kxn phwk cea yang midi mayang phwk cea ley sung brrda khwam labak læa khwam deuxdrxn di prasb kæ phwk khea læa phwk khea di rab khwam hwanhiw cnkrathang rx sul læa brrda phu sraththa sung xyu kab khea klaw khun wa meuxri lea kar chwyhelux khx ngxallxh? Phung ru pheid wa thæcring kar chwyhelux khx ngxallxh kıl xyu læw
